title: What are some examples of core beliefs? - Quora

response.answer_text: The world can be understood through the systematic study of nature and how fundamental governing laws shape every aspect of apparent reality. Our future is determined by how we well we learn the lessons of science. Or, the world is understood to be a place directed by an all knowing, omnipresent entity which cares about humanity and should be worshiped. Our future is in the hands of the higher power. Everything makes sense only within the confines of those fundamental understandings. They are the pillars upon which a person’s entire world view rests.
